title: niravadhika bhuvana sundara krSNA
sahitya:
niravadhika bhuvana sundarA krSNA nIlamaya mrdu kaLEbara candaNa angarAka shObhita mangaLakara


anupallavi

  taraLa ratna mauktAvaLi hAra tammilla samyatA mAyUra


caraNam    dEva puSpa sugandha prakaTita divya latA nikunja vihAra prAvAra 
pItavasana samudrita bhadralEkA vicitra bhAva citra mukha mrgamada tilaka tamAla 
mAla nanda sukumAra kEvalam prapadyE tvAmiha krSNa kALinga naTana manOhara
